articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump threatens tech export limits, new 100% tariff on Chinese imports - NPR
articles.description: President Trump threatened to place an additional 100% tax on Chinese imports starting on Nov. 1 or sooner, potentially escalating tariff rates close to levels that in April fanned fears of a recession.
articles.content: WASHINGTON President Donald Trump on Friday threatened to place an additional 100% tax on Chinese imports starting on Nov. 1 or sooner, potentially escalating tariff rates close to levels that in Apr… [+5965 chars]

articles.title: A tangled web of deals stokes AI bubble fears in Silicon Valley - BBC
